abstract: A federal judge approved a deal in which the bank will pay $600 million to several New York pension funds that sued Countrywide.
snippet: A federal judge approved a deal in which the bank will pay $600 million to several New York pension funds that sued Countrywide.
lead_paragraph: Countrywide Financial’s multibillion-dollar tab for Bank of America just got even steeper.

headline.main: Bank of America Settles Countrywide Financial Case
